channel.title: Pages on Scott Thomas
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Scott Thomas

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Scott. After a thrilling couple of decades in New Zealand where I learned to walk, talk, and pass myself off as a scientist, I headed overseas to continue my studies in astrophysics. Having spent some time working in Australia and Switzerland, I studied for a PhD at the Institute of Astronomy, Cambridge. I now work as a data scientist at an educational technology company. Past work During my PhD I worked with Nikku Madhusudhan on the structure and evolution of terrestrial (Earth-like) planets in other solar systems.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Until I set up a more permanent web presence, the easiest way to get in touch with me is probably through one of the social media options below. Social media Find me on Linkedin. Friend me on Facebook. See what I’m up to on GitHub.
